name: Ahi Poke
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chopped red ogo (see note) or minced kelp
2 tablespoons roasted candlenuts (kukui nuts), macadamias or peanuts, ground into coarse crumbs (see note)
1 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Dice tuna into 1/2-inch cubes, and place in a medium-size bowl. Rinse seaweed. Sprinkle seaweed and remaining ingredients over fish, and toss gently to mix. Serve.
